alert.note: Alert for Covington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 8:56PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Covington County through 945 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Opp, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opp. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
